alert.note: Alert for Mecosta (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 11 at 1:20PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Michigan, including the following county, Mecosta. * WHEN...Until 730 PM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 118 PM EDT, reliable reports have been received of heavy rain in the warned area. Flooding is already occurring in the Big Rapids area. A rain gage in the Big Rapids area reported over 3 inches of rain so far. The Thunderstorms with torrential downpours could result in another inch or two of rain. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Big Rapids and Paris. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
